catalog_info.title: Gujarat Livestock Survey
catalog_info.description: This dataset provides a comprehensive survey of livestock populations across districts in Gujarat. It is valuable for AI modeling related to livestock management, disease prediction, and agricultural resource allocation, enabling data-driven decision-making for improved animal husbandry practices.

provenance.ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
provenance.department: Department of Animal Husbandry and Veterinary Services
